page.title: 18WHEN I LEAVE SCHOOL
page.content: When I leave Stockton Hall School I intend to become a long distance lorry driver,and drive through the night,and sleep in the day-time.I shall not be able to drive at the age of sixteen but I shall go as a driver's mate and help him unload the cargo. I shall have to learn to drive and have my sight tested if I want to be a driver myself some day.Sight is very important if you want to do a lot of night driving. I'm not going to get married unless I'm tempted and if I do then I shall have one child and hope it's a boy.I shall go to the Pub but only for a couple of pints unless it's Christmas.I'm not going to smoke because it is too expensive and anyway it damages your health.In my spare time I'll make model boats or aeroplanes.
